branchCategory.name: 2/3 Port Solenoid Valve for Chemicals
branchCategory.description: <p>Compact 2 and 3 port solenoid valve for chemicals. It is designed to meet the most advanced needs of process controls in various analytical and inspection equipment. LVM's unique internal chamber design reduces the swept volume to a minimum and can mean zero dead volume and carry over. LVM is available in 4 different body sizes and diaphragm material can be chosen from EPDM, FKM or Kalrez&reg;. LVM's life is rated at 10 million cycles or more.</p>

branchItem.name: LVM09/090, 2/3 Port Solenoid Valve for Chemicals
branchItem.description: <p>LVM09/090 is a compact direct operated 2/3 port solenoid valve for chemicals. LVM's unique internal chamber design reduces the swept volume to a minimum and can mean zero dead volume and carry over. &nbsp;Operating pressure ranges from -75 kPa to 0.2 MPa.&nbsp;</p>

branchItem.name: LVM10/100, 2/3 Port Solenoid Valve for Chemicals
branchItem.description: <p>LVM10/100 is a compact direct operated 2/3 port solenoid valve for chemicals. LVM's unique internal chamber design reduces the swept volume to a minimum and can mean zero dead volume and carry over. Operating pressure ranges from -75 kPa&nbsp;to 0.25 MPa. LVM10/100 is available as body ported, direct tube connection or base mounted.</p>

branchItem.name: LVM15/150, 2/3 Port Solenoid Valve for Chemicals
branchItem.description: <p>LVM15/150 is a compact direct operated 2/3 port solenoid valve for chemicals. LVM's unique internal chamber design reduces the swept volume to a minimum and can mean zero dead volume and carry over. &nbsp;Operating pressure ranges from -75 kPa to 0.60 MPa. LVM15/150 is available as base mounted with a sub-plate (M6 or 1/4-28UNF).</p>

branchItem.name: LVM20/200, 2/3 Port Solenoid Valve for Chemicals
branchItem.description: <p>LVM20/200 is a compact direct operated 2/3 port solenoid valve for chemicals. LVM's unique internal chamber design reduces the swept volume to a minimum and can mean zero dead volume and carry over. &nbsp;Operating pressure ranges from -75 kPa to 0.30 MPa. LVM20/200 is available as body ported, direct tube connection or base mounted. Maximum flow up to Cv of 0.065</p>
